v1.0.0: Workspace is the new progressive web app derived from Zimo Web, utilizing its latest windows framework.
v1.0.2: Window Gallery is now saved between sessions.
v1.0.4: Removed randomize themes on every visit setting as it has no effect.
v1.0.5: The dimension of the favicon window is now adjustible.
v1.0.6: Slightly tweaked the default dimension of the Window Gallery.
v1.0.7: * Increased the limit of number of windows to 80.
v1.0.8: Fixed a miscalculation in window snapping.
v1.0.9: Fixed a rare issue that occurs while adjusting the window with aspect ratio constraint in adaptive mode.
v1.0.10: Fixed the default dimension of the Window Gallery not applying properly.
v1.0.11: Fixed the Notebook page limit being too low.
v1.1.0: Added the window debugger, which can be enabled in settings. This is a developer tool but might otherwise be enjoyable.
v1.1.1: Slightly adjusted the window debugger's styling.
v1.1.2: Window debugger now has its own icon.
v1.1.3: Removed disable special theme setting as it has no effect.
v1.1.4: Improved the horizontal border check of window dragging.
v1.1.6: Improved the styling of the settings slider bar.
v1.1.7: Added fireworks effect to the Birthday 19 theme.
v1.1.8: Improved some edge cases handling of windows.
v1.1.9: Fixed a crash that occurs when trying to duplicate or export Notebook pages when the Notebook is empty.
v1.1.10: Rebuild of the previous version with up-to-date Node.
v1.1.12: Updated the icon of the Pixelland theme.
v1.1.13: Updated the ordering of icons in the Signal Generator.
v1.2.0: Removed the Accent (middle) and Soft (soft) colors from theme configuration. The Theme Maker is updated accordingly.
v1.2.1: The sun in the Pixelland theme is now animated.
v1.2.2: Adjusted the dimension of the embedded webpage windows.
v1.2.4: Implemented shift key functionality for window dragging.
v1.3.1: Slightly adjusted the Theme Maker's styling.
v1.3.2: Slightly adjusted the default width of the Theme Maker window.
v1.3.3: Added a title section to the sidebar menu.
v1.4.0: Added the Eventide, Meadowland, and Murk theme.
v1.4.2: Re-release of the previous version with better compression.
v1.4.3: Adjusted the animation speed of the Eventide theme.
v1.4.4: Fixed an issue where saved windows could sometimes lose width and height.
v1.4.5: Adjusted the behavior of window expanding to center.
v1.4.6: Saved windows are now restored instantly.
v1.5.0: Redesigned many glyphs and the favicon.
v1.5.3: Adjusted the dimension of the favicon window.
v1.5.4: Slightly improved the handling of the favicon window.
v1.5.6: Simplified the icons of the Blog and Album theme.
v1.6.0: Added the Unity theme which is now the default theme.
v1.6.3: Theme Maker profiles selector now supports drag-and-drop gestures to import profiles.
v1.6.4: Improved the Theme Maker profile import notifications.
v1.6.5: Redesigned the Unity theme and updated the site favicon accordingly.
v1.6.6: Reordered a few themes in the settings.
v1.6.7: Fixed the layout of the profile selector.
v1.6.8: Fixed a logic error in the window centering action.
v1.7.0: Theme Maker settings can now be accessed directly from the toolbar.
v1.8.0: Added the ability to customize the favicon in the favicon window.
v1.8.1: Improved the logic of the favicon window customization panel.
v1.8.2: Energize is now a preset theme instead of a template profile.
v1.8.3: Fixed an issue in the minimal backdrop gradient of the Energize theme.
v1.8.4: Adjusted the shadow intensity of the favicon window customization panel to be more consistent with other windows.
v1.8.5: Fixed a rendering issue of outline favicons in the panel.
v1.8.6: Optimized the storage size of the favicon window when using custom favicons.
v1.8.7: Adjusted the stroke weight of some glyphs.
v1.9.1: Slightly adjusted the hovering effect of some elements.
v1.9.2: Adjusted the hovering effect of some more elements.
v1.10.1: Updated the year of copyright information.
v1.10.3: * Re-added the Scintillating theme with a slightly different design.
* Added a subtle animation to the Memories theme animated background.
v1.10.6: Added theme-specific text selection effect to the Sticky Notes.
v1.10.7: Active window now has its controls slightly less transparent to distinguish it better.
v1.10.9: Adjusted the rendering of some assets.
v1.11.0: * Added the Gallery 3D theme and reworked the Verdant theme.
